column3: “Woah... I didn't sign on for this. Lasted so damn long. I got the bottom of the jar of some other bud, which had some of this mixed in with it. Holy smokes! I got high, two hours later I drove home once it ebbed and it hit again when I got home. It went on for the rest of the day like that with the high coming and going. I went to sleep, woke up still high. Went back to sleep again. It took hours before I was complet...”

“I normally don't use much Sativa since I have fibromyalgia and I like the Indica muscle relaxant effects, but I need a good Sativa for the day so I thought I would try it. Very gentle smoke, and within minutes cleared my Fibro Fog" and got rid of my muscle spasms (head/torso) and my headache dissolved. I was able to focus and have energy to do my light web work I do. This is a nice strain and it will probably be a r...”"
“Feeling a bit blah" in the morning.  Coffee
column4: juice and S.A.G.E will change your attitude and fast! You'll be smiling and dancing around the room. Not at all spacey.  This strain is a must for all of you sativa lovers.  It's in my top 5.”"

column3: “This strain might be the best strain I've ever smoked.  I live in NJ and have a medical card.  The S.A.G.E I smoke is 24% THC, with inconsequential amounts of CBD, CBG, etc.  I usually prefer indicas but this strain is absolutely amazing.  Almost instantly you get hit with a little uplifting euphoric push, which turns into this extremely functional, clear-headed high. I have terrible anxiety (which sativas usually in...”

“We got a great deal in town, $25 for an eighth of Sage. This strain is very very airy and light. The nugs are not dense, but cotton ballish and seemingly made up mostly of pale orange hairs. It smells awesome, like a bright pine autumn day, haha. It smokes very very quickly, like a bong rip will blast most of the bowl, and tastes woody.. fading out as a pear like fruit taste. It's surprisingly potent for how light it...”

“I'm a new jersey MMJ PATIENT and I picked this up from break water dispensary. Testing at 23.35% and WOW is this feeling incredible. It goes right to your head and then slowly descends down your body. It literally does give you a calming effect. I wish things weren't so restricted and exspensive here because if I could I'd buy weight of this. Don't pass it up if you get a chance!!!”

“Damm this is a potent strain. It makes you focus but in a weird way. While you are focused on something it is a disorganized focus. You lock onto the task but it takes a lot longer to accomplish. I love this strain but would not reccomend it to anyone looking for a productive high. Its great for movies or for me Call of Duty on my PS3. You focus so hard on the game you almost feel like you are there.”
“Great bud! Dense nuggets! Beautiful in color! Decent amount of crystals! Long lasting, even with a high-tolerance! THANK GOD! Lol! And just good nugget all around! :] <3”

“I have this awesome strain more than 10 years. My own selected mother is 7year old, because its one of few great strains for me and my head. SAGE have strong celebral effect .  Great to cure your stress, insomnia, pain, good appetite suppressant  with beautifful natural smell and taste. I recommend to people looking for a strong sativa effects”

“One hell of a strain. I just smoked quarter of a spliff and my mind is on overdrive. I generally smoke and listen to electro-chill music, it's insane. I feel like the music is being controlled by me, I can hear the music in my head perfectly and detect every single nuance. All sounds in the room are amplified and echoed.

I'm so aware of everything, I feel like I'm taking everything in so much that it's confusing....”

“I've been waiting to write this review because I was a bit unsure about my thoughts on this strain.  I was instantly pleased after my second session of vaping of Sage. I was so lifted that I felt like I was a living breathing fucking TREE! Awesome!!! If you are suffering from just feeling out of control,  Sage may help you as it has for me.  I can really get deep into my meditation and peace of mind no matter how cra...”
“My cat and me like this”

“Emotional burdens and stress have a gargantuan impact on physical pain. It's rare that you find a strain that can eliminate pain without knocking you out or nailing you to the couch.  S.A.G.E. works double duty for both issues, it's long lasting with the added mental clarity bonus. This is now my daytime go-to for joint and nerve pain.”
“DAMN DANIEL”

“Leafly Reviews

SAGE
In bud form, beautiful light green with dark green hues. The buds are small and fluffy, abundant light orange hairs coupled with cotton can't like frosting; almost spider web like!

Smell is sage, wood, with a hit of diesel or soap" as I call it.

column1: After busting in my Med+Tainer the "soap" smell was sweetly coupled with more sage. Diesel lovers will enjoy this smell along with the woody sage sent...”"

column3: “Picked up some excellent SAGE from Nature's AZ and it is amazing! Tested around 20% THC, perfectly cured sticky goodness. One of the finest strains Ive ever smoked in my 20 plus years of smoking. This is exactly what i want out of my meds, uplifting positive vibrations for your soul.”

“Leafly Reviews

SAGE
In bud form, beautiful light green with dark green hues. The buds are small and fluffy, abundant light orange hairs coupled with cotton can't like frosting; almost spider web like!

Smell is sage, wood, with a hit of diesel or soap" as I call it.

column1: After busting in my Med+Tainer the "soap" smell was sweetly coupled with more sage. Diesel lovers will enjoy this smell along with the woody sage sent...”"

column3: “There is your everyday weed and then there is your special occasion weed.  S.A.G.E is special occasion weed that you breakout when you want to go to a profoundly different level of consciousness. A spiritual euphoria....bliss. A powerful strain. Highly recommend.”

“I've been waiting to write this review because I was a bit unsure about my thoughts on this strain.  I was instantly pleased after my second session of vaping of Sage. I was so lifted that I felt like I was a living breathing fucking TREE! Awesome!!! If you are suffering from just feeling out of control,  Sage may help you as it has for me.  I can really get deep into my meditation and peace of mind no matter how cra...”

“Excellent buds, tight and the color of the hairs is a bright orange. The smell is strong and has a nice aroma to it. The effects are monstrous. It did me in (I am about 6' 220 lbs.) left me numb in the arms and legs, and spinning for a while (I guess I over did it that time). But yeah, if your looking for a mind eraser, this is a great one to chill out and be quiet to. I only wish I had a bed around to go to sleep at...”

“My number one. So I love with this plant. Some one on here said some thin like feeling crapy have some coffee and sage and it will fix your day first thing in the morning. And I agree fully. But there is an added bonus if you have a bit after dinner and you kick your boots off for the day, she will help you wind down for the day. SAGE is a girl that just know what you need and she can fix it. She's a smart one. All s...”
“this strain gives off an unbelievable similar Aroma to its name, and give you a nice comfortable head and body high.”

“The bud is lush and covered with pistils. Ground up, SAGE has a nice clean spicy smell with faint hints of citrus rind. 

Steamroller:  The exhale is smooth yet feels heavy and dense in the mouth. Initial sensation develops in sinuses and temples,  moving slowly down to the base of the cranium, invoking a sensation of a very small weight placed on the head. 

Water Pipe:  The taste comes out much harsher yet give...”

“Holy shit. S.A.G.E. is AMAZING for PTSD, Depression, Nausea, Fatigue or anything of the like. This is NOT RECCOMENDED FOR ROOKIES. This will send a novice to his outer limits and really test how well you have your psyche holding together. This will give a pro, a moderately strong to strong HIGH FOR HOURS. It feels like drinking 4 strong cups of coffee with a moderate body buzz (most likely from the Afghani side of th...”

“A warm, buttery high. Incredibly euphoric mixed with peaceful resignedness. Soft across the board with a gleeful, childlike attentiveness. Pretty disconnected, fuzzy, and distant from your body. It takes forever to focus on anything, but vision is bright and smooth like plush leather. Impossibly short attention span makes even the smallest things super compelling. Potent high that lingers at a high intensity for an i...”

“This is a lot more exciting than Sativa Afghani Genetic Equilibrium sounds like it might be.  The euphoric Haze in this hybrid takes effect almost immediately, followed by a lasting full body relaxation from the strong Indica strain".  Gives excellent pain relief--the chronic pain in my leg from a herniated disc took a two-hour break after I smoked a bowl of SAGE.”"

“Great smell and taste. Non smokers nearby said the smell made them want to try it. It was a confusing high, very mellow, I kept asking myself if I needed more. Goldilocks for sure, not too hot not too cold”

“I just tried this for the 3rd time and finally decided to sit down and write this review. My first time, I didn't think too much of... 2nd time was better, but holy mackerel, the 3rd time was apparently a charm. 2 bingers and I was floating... no really... I was floating! I also measured about an 8.5 on the retard meter. Found myself going in and out of a room 36 six time, just to realize all I really wanted was beer...”

I'm so aware of everything, I feel like I'm taking everything in so much that it's confusing....”
“So good. I use to smoke it in the afternoon, when I gotta wake up at 3 am. First, I laugh for everything during 5 to 15 min, and after i just fall sleep like a koala.”
“Awesome flavor. Very fluffy”

“SAGE reminds me of blueberry... very well balanced, relaxing but still delivers a head high. I find my attention span is great with SAGE... I can watch a movie, work on a project, take a hike, and I stay focused, interested, and capable. It does have a noticeable indica undercurrent, which makes it better for activities that don't require a lot of talking. I find it makes me almost serene, but rather quiet.”

“this is a strain for smokers who have a high tolerance 27.3 % thc rock hard buds holy $hit the first hit was amazing only a few puffs and i was stoned to the bone highly recommended strain buzz last for hours”

“This is one of my most favoured strains. It is a very smooth smoking bud, with a very unique scent. It never fails to deliver, and works great for controlling my pain.  You can never go wrong with the SAGE :-)”

“After some intense research I bought this strain  to use for breeding but had to scrap the idea due to time and space constraints, but decided to grow the strain despite the long flowering time required(77 Days). 
I was not disappointed with the yield and the high was as advertised. AWESOME!!
Hard hitting with a nice clear head buzz soon followed by an uplifting and happy high. The body high from the Afghan influence...”

“Sativa-dominant hybrid that doesn't take long at all to get you up and movin. For the munchies, last night, I moved like a bullet in the kitchen. Turning a bland container of noodles into a giant bowl of Teriyaki soup. Ate at least 75% of it right afterwards. Nickname for this should be Get Up and Go". Smoke up if you want an uneventful night to speed up a tad.”"

“ive had this strain about 3 times I love it...it has a very woody smell a lot of thc crystals(the ones I had).the high is very nice not very dense,the taste to me is hazy...the high can last me about hour or maybe 2(depends on how much I put in the joint)but a awesome strain for laughing and if you have social anxiety like I do it is great for that”

“I have a hard time finding strains that work well for me to smoke all day without me either losing my high quickly or wanting to take a nap. This one is perfect. Nice motivating high in the beginning then it mellows into a thought provoking chill high. Love it for doing homework and sitting through long lectures too. Allows me to pay attention to things better.”

“Purchased as a special and pleasantly surprised. Its a good one for people with a high tolerance. Beautiful scent, not too strong, and a sort of creeping effect. Lasts quite some time after first dosing, but still recommend two bowls to start.”

“This specific strain, obtained from Arizona Organix, known for their proprietary Papa's OG strain, caught my eye because it had a whopping 1.43% CBG.  For CBD, that's like actually a typical indica or even the lower end of CBD. But my budtender at AZ Organix was telling me much it helps IBS, ulcers, stomach pain or nausea in general, and I have HORRIBLE IBS-D.  It's only 14% THC ( I say only because papa's og last ti...”

“I enjoyed the fact that the strain delivers on getting you high. However beware the relaxing effect, might have you couch locked for some time. On the positive note, it also made for good conversation with others.”

“Hit just EXPLODES into your lungs like a good hit of hash. Sightly earthy/robust as opposed to harsh. SAGE gives you the ol' one-two w/ tha sativa jab and indica hook. KO's every time... I must reiterate for the price you really cant beat this one. It's right up there in my top ten I must say. The nuggets are so dense they just keep hitting and hitting.  -PBB-”

This strain always made me super happy. The flowers are long and fluffy, with a darker green with a slightly bluish hue. The smell is of well, sage, and a bit of citrus. Same goes for the flavor, extremely smooth if flushed properly. Old schoo...”

“Purchased as a special and pleasantly surprised. Its a good one for people with a high tolerance. Beautiful scent, not too strong, and a sort of creeping effect. Lasts quite some time after first dosing, but still recommend two bowls to start.”

“Picked up some sage from Einstein Buds and have very nice crystals, taste reminds me of the ole columbo in my school days, very nice. Helps with relaxing and unwind and sleep good. Helps with my herniated disc! Thx R & C for the awesome
med's and gr8 customer service. This was my 3rd visit and very happy, look forward to the new med's coming! 

; )

Cheers,”

I have chronic back pain which runs between uncomfortable to sometimes unbearable and this strain provides me with a positive numbing effect whenever I use it to medicate, and the relief is instant. I also suffer from PTSD and a great deal of anxiety. S.A.G.E. completely does away with my anxiety. 100% of the time a...”

“Mind numbingly good! it gave me the giggles and a nice, balanced head and body buzz. had a hard time focusing on conversation and had a light bout of paranoia but other than that it definitely helped with reducing stress. man, I was baked off my ass after only 2 hits for a good 6 hours and time felt slow. powerful bud.”
“I love the flavor and how sticky the buds are.”

“its in my top 3 now. heavy hitter (the onset is almost scary lol) but after 3 hits and about 5-10 minutes its like ahhh. relaxing and smooth. lasts a long time. pain subsides gradually getting very relaxed. try it if you havent.”

“I was surprised how much I liked this strain, it has a nice sage aroma with a real earthy smoke overall. Gives you a low mellow mood with a nice head high. Good stuff, although there's other strains I enjoy more then this.”
“very nice in appearance, earthy smell and explosive in mental focus and alertness. highly recommend for those who are busy throughout the day”

“one of my favorites. a truly functioning head high and sage og is a great functioning head high with a nice tingling body high attached. I strongly recommend”

column5: and I'm inside the water bed and it's moving around me like jiggling
column6: and I'm just suspended in air like that
column7: and I can feel everything pulsating around me." - Sharon Stoned

column3:
“S.A.G.E. produces a wonderful high, off of a clean, fresh, herbal lemon inhale followed by a slightly piney ting. A onset behind the eyes and shoulders begins while keepin' a smile on the face :)
3.5/5”
“good bud when dry”
“nice long buzz, reasonably tasty when dried”
“A pretty strong, very happy buzz that fades into a very peaceful, quiet high. There's not much couch lock, but a little bit and very minimal munchies. Overall good, chill strain.”
“got that legal for Washington ..first dispensary exp...was wonderful”
“this shit rocks for daytime”

“It was my understanding the S.A.G.E. was a Mazar and Big Sur Holy cross. I have the 90's version that is more Big Sur Holy dominant. Today's available S.A.G.E. strains are the Mazar dominant variety it seems.”
“Awesome all around everyday bud. Very potent low smell so very stealthy. Great taste. A+ Grade Tested.”
“very good & unique strain with a sage & woody taste.”
“fiiiiiiiiine”

“I love this strain. It reminds me of my favorite, rug burn, and another good one, Larry. It smells wonderful and earthy and sweet, had a nice smooth smoke and delivers an intense high. Perfect for anytime of day.”
“I like the taste

column1: I like it all - it does it well!
I'm totally down to f***ing rage!"

column3: “Very mellow and helped ease my depression and anxiety. Has a strong woody taste and smell and leaves a bad after taste. I don't feel much more energized than normal but I do feel my mind is more at ease and clear headed. No hunger and actually feels like it suppresses my appetite which is nice.”
“Great high good taste, long lasting, strong, stinky, amazing!”
“Amazing strain. One of thbb”

Big problem for me is the next day I simply can not get detail work done properly as I have a hangover from it.  For instance AK47 has zero hangover effect no matter how hard I use it the night before.  I wake up clearheaded after a good night's sleep.  But w...”

“I love this strain I have grown it out from seed before an it was a pleasure to watch it grow, it smelled like fruity candy an it was covered in trichomes from bud to leaf. The smoke is on my top favorite. If ur thinking about growing this beautiful strain do so u will be very happy”

“Great strain , used to alleviate headaches and migraines. Just a bowl of this will have your headaches gone and replaced with a nice head high that keeps you going! I recommend this to people that suffer from migraines and want something to keep them feeling happy and euphoric.”

“Very nice Sativa high from a bud that was dark green, dense, and covered in white sticky crystals. The taste and smell is great and like nothing else I've tried. All around great strain would definitely recommend.”

“This weed is airy and strandy, because of this it smokes fast or bowls have to be packed densely. It has a woody flavor which I enjoyed, and is fairly potent as well. My high was fairly uplifted, I got some things done, and it had some stress relieving and pain relieving effects as well.”

“Great high with long buzz Perfect med for me”

“Great stuff, noticeably euphoric, which is a strong word and rare for me, seeing how i use cannabis to help level out my bipolar symptoms (insomnia, anxiety, depression, etc.)

will be buying again!”
“great regular smoke, never get bored, very happy indeed!”
“I really like this!  My only thing is it is not a hunger surpresant... I get the munchies bad!”
“Had a very bold/unique taste. very good for daytime with the slight indica body high. also loved the tricomb coverage”

“This beauty from th seeds is awesome. Tight bud structure with lots of orange hairs. A mind and body relaxation set in immediately, providing the user with an uplifting but relaxed feeling. A great strain for creativity and appetite stimulation . Very long lasting and uplifting high that tends to settle into a body relaxation towards the end.  smells like sage,  dry  pine  with undertones of sandalwood. A plus Medici...”

“Taste-
Not a particularly pleasant flavor for me. It's true to it's name, sage-like and woody. I know it's contradictory but I found it smooth and harsh; on the back of my palate the woody flavor was smooth, but up in my sinuses I was almost on the verge of needing to cough. 
Physical-
Took away my hip, lower back and neck pain. Took it way, not just took my mind off of it. I felt like getting up and doing something,...”
“Great pine aroma that really transfers to the flavor.  Great hybrid that allows me to relax but keeps me focused on the task I have in front of me.  Awesome.”
“Nice morning bud... GOOD MORNING POT SMOKING AMERICA!”
“Top Shelf Flower. All around awesome.”
“smelled like brown gravy... weird huh but in the way cheese strains smell like feet but in a good way”
“Power tackle, two of the finest strains combine to make an awesome heavy hitter which gives you a body and head high it's absolutely unreal. If you spot this give it a try you will not regret it”

“SAGE feels very sativa dominant, or at least those effects come through for sure. I'm not usually a sativa person, but through a pax 3 this strain came through smooth and came on in the mind. I read on some history (which I love), and smoked again later.”
“my personal favorite”
“Really like the flavor”

“Enjoyed before annual holiday party which made it tons more paleteable. Cheery, bounce in my step, but not overly euphoric. The second time I vaped it was much more understated and mellow, quite different from the first time.”
“This stuff really got me high, i can take in as much as i want as long as my throat doesn't hurt too badly and it felt wonderful”
“alert, fun. would be good for outside.”

“Cleared my pain pretty much all over my body. I enjoyed this strain a lot, because I felt good, but in a chill way. I was calm, but ready to do whatever. Great strain for enjoying life. There are other strains that are more powerful in ...”
“Very nice to relax and star gaze :-)”

“It's awesome because it smells exactly like sage, and also kind of like peppermint. On the exhale you get a nice cooling menthol effect which is nice because most strains don't have that pleasant of an aftertaste. It's a very potent indica dominant, I would only recommend for nighttime use.”
“Definitely on the stronger side, stinky, great for when you have tasks to do.”
“This was a very relaxed, calm and uplifting high, I stayed very happy and amused the whole time, I just wish it had been a little more of a mental high”

“This cut is from Farmer J's in Washington State. This bud was cured very well and had a nice snap in your hand that released the great unique aroma from Sage. The smell and taste on the exhale is that of woody almost birch and that of well....sage...duh. I have yet to encounter a flower with the same unique great smell. The high from this strain is perfect for daytime use especially for outdoor activities. This is fo...”
“This strain is potent and super pungent. Sage has an earthy smell, very deep green look, and a very focused-energetic high. However it's also relaxing and good for pain.”

“I am enjoying this strain, really good functional high Satuva, A good morning smoke as it doesn't seem to cloud the thinking. I got a bit drowsy after a while but it is a hybrid strain. Great bud. Would smoke aagain”
“it's great”

“pretty good smoke,faint sage smell,earthy,skunky and a bit spice.smoked a half joint and felt great!good f/ wake and bake.good f/ pain,depression,anxiety and insomnia.another one of those good anytime smokes.nice green,sticky buds w/ lots of red hairs and white crystals.i really liked smoking it again it had been a while and it`s still good!grown by Daring Farms.”

Unfortunately, they can have the complete oppoisite effect, and also set of my TMJ and anxiety.  Sage seems to be really well-suited for me and my G.I. issues, and doesn't have the usual sid...”

“Sage from pingstron creek, so far one of my
 favorite”
“Has been a favorite of mine for years”

“i prefer to smoke this from a joint or a pipe.  when i hit it from a bong i get really dizzy and uncomfortable.  i am a girl, but i don't think it's TOO strong, just right :)”

“said to be the best of best....but as a true smoker I don't agree. yes you feel it right away; but the hit and taste is like smoking Reggie Bush smh.....an it's aroma is vague. the actual bud smells strong an is very sticky and breaks up great in a grinder.....but as a smoker it has to taste, hit, smell, and make you feel good to be the best of the best”

“I  don't recommend this to anyone who smokes smh....smells like peppermint and basically does nothing but a small head rush. Looks an feels very bushy an hay like; but breaks up nicely in a grinder. Only way I could enjoy was when I mixed it with my fav, Blue Dream classic. All in all it acts as a form of hash or keef. I don't recommend smoking it alone; unless it's all you have.”
